data.title: British Film Institute
data.text:
Synopsis

Comedy based on characters featured in the television show `Harry Enfield and chums'. Two hormonally challenged schoolboys on a quest to lose their virginity and become the world's greatest DJ mixmasters try their luck in Ibiza. Comedy. Kevin and Perry are two dim schoolboys who are wholly preoccupied with sex - and how to get it. With this in mind, they are desperate to visit the island of Ibiza, a favourite place for British teenagers. By good fortune they manage to obtain enough money to go to the place of their dreams - but romancing the opposite sex is not as easy as they think, even though they make an important contact - a disc jockey known as Eye Ball Paul... (Synopsis)
